articles.author: Emilia David
articles.title: Google's Gemini 1.5 Pro can now hear - The Verge
articles.description: Google updated Gemini 1.5 Pro to include the ability to understand audio as it makes its way to Vertex AI. Its image model, Imagen 2, also has new features.
articles.content:
Googles Gemini 1.5 Pro can now hear

articles.author: Omkar Godbole
articles.title: Bitcoin Could Slump Around Reward Halving Time, Arthur Hayes Says - CoinDesk
articles.description: The crypto market faces the U.S. tax season liquidity test around the time the Bitcoin blockchain implements the fourth mining-reward halving on April 20.
articles.content:
• Bitcoin may face selling pressure in the second half of April as the supposedly bullish impact of halving is already well entrenched, Hayes said in a blog post.
